Centralised Distribution System

  • Better contro:

    • One of the advantages of having a centralized distribution is to have better control. Organizations setup central stores which are responsible for all activities and transport their inventory as and when required to other stores which are usually attached to the production capacities located in different locations.

Retailing has now become a science of selling smartly. To make this science happen in your shop, adapt to new challenges of fashion, control overstocking, satisfy customers by giving complete range of stock with good schemes and value added service, use RETAIL-CLICK!

"RETAIL-CLICK"â€™ is a software for Retail Management. This software takes complete care of inventory system of Retail shops where every item can be barcoded piece to piece. It is being used by more than 500 retail outlets across India.
